project.name: press coverage
project.description: Several sites (and other media) exist that occasionally talk about Gentoo using (submitted or self-written) articles. This subproject maintains a list of all available Gentoo articles and updates the several press media about Gentoo.

longdescription.p: As Gentoo's popularity increases, more and more sites devote articles to the Gentoo distribution (and its community). This project aims to list all written articles so that interested users and developers can easily know where Gentoo has been referred from.

Sometimes (well, frequently :) Gentoo innovates and gives new and unprecedented features to its users. This news is easily propagated amongst users, but less frequently to the more broad media. Submitting correct and well-written articles to well-known media can increase Gentoo's adoptation.

milestone.description: Maintain a list of all articles published that talk about Gentoo
When Gentoo breaks the news on a certain subject, make sure that all news-sites are informed about it.
